txt.en: 'Bah! Those blasted goblins can see almost as keenly in the dark as the sharpest dwarf-eyes. Best to take them by surprise and dispatch a few of their sentries before we are caught and buried under a mass of the evil things.'
'Ha! There are so many goblins about, no one will miss an odd sentry or two! Good work, [placeholder].'
'Have you dealt with the goblins yet?'

The caves along western Nan Curunír are guarded by vicious goblins.\n\nAs long as their watch is maintained, it will be difficult to approach the caverns unseen, so Ondor has asked you to thin their ranks.
Goblins can be found near the cave in western Nan Curunír.\n\nOndor has asked you to thin the number of Goblins around the caves before venturing within.
Talk to Ondor in Nan Curunír
Ondor is near the caves in western Nan Curunír.\n\nYou should return to Ondor with news of your success.
